page.title: 14GAMES
page.content: Some{games}that are played{today}are very{similar}to those our{parents played.{Old favourites}are{marbles, {conkers,tick,skipping,hopscotch,Jacks {and Hide and Seek. Boys}also enjoy {Football, girls Netball}and{both}play {Rounders. Modern games}that are played in our playground are{Poison}and{Stuck {in the Mud.}To play{Poison}the person {'On It'}holds out his arms in a T shape.The rest of the players hold on to his fingers. He then tells them a{poisonous}word.Then he tells a story As soon as he says the poisonous word the rest loose go the finger and run. The person 'On It'chases them.When a person is ticked he helps catches the others.To play{Stuck in the Mud}one person tries to tick the others.When a person is ticked he stands still with his arms in a T shape. The others have to save him by running under his arms.
